title: Apple releases watchOS 8.5 beta 3 to developers [U]
content:
Update: watchOS 8.5 beta 3 is also available to public beta testers now.

Apple is releasing today watchOS 8.5 beta 3 to all developers. This version comes five days after the company made available watchOS 8.4.2 to all users.

more…

The post Apple releases watchOS 8.5 beta 3 to developers [U] appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Apple is releasing watchOS 8.5 beta 3 to all developers. This version comes five days after the company launched watchOS 8.4.2 to all users.
